quotes: Satish Nambiar was born in Bombay (now Mumbai) on 30 August 1936

Lieutenant General Chenicheri Satish Nambiar is an Indian general who achieved international recognition as the first Force Commander and Head of Mission of UNPROFOR, the United Nations Protection Force in the former Yugoslavia, between March 1992 and March 1993.
Preceded by First Appointee Commander UNPROFOR 1992 – 1993

Satish Nambiar was born in Bombay (now Mumbai) on 30 August 1936
He is an Alumnus of St Xavier's College Mumbai during which he was an Under Officer with the National Cadet Corps.
He did most of his education in Pune and Mumbai.

Lieutenant General Chenicheri Satish Nambiar is an Indian general who achieved international recognition as the first Force Commander and Head of Mission of UNPROFOR, the United Nations Protection Force in the former Yugoslavia, between March 1992 and March 1993.
